alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 22 at 2:37PM MDT until October 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SUNDAY TO 6 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains and Central Carbon County including Rawlins. * WHEN...From 3 AM Sunday to 6 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to falling snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains
